text: If you're using RSI and MACD to trade... why are you still losing money?
Because indicators are lagging. They're built from past prices.
By the time RSI says 'oversold'... the move is already over.
And false signals? Everywhere. RSI hits 30, you buy, price keeps falling.
But here's the real problem: everyone watches the same levels.
When a million traders see RSI at 70 and sell... that creates the reversal.
So what works? Price action. Volume. Market structure.
The raw data... before it gets averaged and delayed.
Indicators aren't useless. They're just not enough.
